definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: Fear of consequences is a common deterrent from wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 一般不做壞事遏阻原因是害怕後果。

sentences.english: Why is the province while some people say bad things people do it?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼坦洲一會兒有人說是國內某省的人做壞事呢？

sentences.english: Confusion isn’t a bad thing. It means you’re growing and thinking.
sentences.chinese: 困惑不見得是壞事，那表示你在思索和成長。

sentences.english: Too much of a good thing.
Have change, something good something bad.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，也一樣好事多過壞事。

sentences.english: Jame's uncle is an old fox, up to all kinds of evils.
sentences.chinese: 簡的叔叔是個老狐狸，什麼壞事都幹得出來。

sentences.english: His friend tempted him into wrongdoings.
As a result, the bad thing has been turned into a good one.
Maybe indulging every so often is not a bad thing -- especially if it's dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 也許經常沉迷於此物並非壞事，尤其是食用黑巧克力。

sentences.english: Ep560 - Old Madam Hong tries to persuade Zhizhong stop his evil deeds, but Zhizhong ignores her.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太苦口婆心勸志忠勿再做壞事，但志忠不加理會。

sentences.english: Teddy: Yes. Because whenever mama bear comes out of her cave, bad things happen.
sentences.chinese: 因爲只要暴走熊媽媽出洞，壞事就會接二連三地發生。

sentences.english: Or we'll speak of a wrong-doer as washing their hands of a crime.
sentences.chinese: 否則我們將會認爲一個做壞事的人不再犯罪。

sentences.english: The setting is always dark and mysterious and the atmosphere is just right for doing something dirty.
sentences.chinese: 場景總是黑暗而神祕，這種氣氛正好適合幹壞事。

sentences.english: As for the Madrid and London bombings, bad stuff happens.
sentences.chinese: 至於馬德里和倫敦爆炸案，那是壞事發生了。

sentences.english: We must not stand by when people damage state property.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須與壞人壞事作鬥爭，不能袖手旁觀。

sentences.english: Some people become bad because they learn from the bad people in those programmes.
sentences.chinese: 有些人變成壞事，因爲他們從這些方案的壞人學習。

definition: only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
